Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Montgomery -- 1% S&U Tax Renewal - M&TC - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Montgomery Proposition
(Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Montgomery, Louisiana (the "Town"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect a one percent (1%) sales and use tax, beginning on January 1, 2020 upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption and storage for service of items in the municipality, all as defined by law, subject to mandatory exemptions, with the annual tax levy amount currently estimated to be approximately $40,000, where said tax is and shall be used in all areas of Town business including without limitation maintenance, upkeep, police and fire protection, and the term of the tax shall be five (5) consecutive years?

Race.SpecificTitle: Village of Dry Prong -- 1% S&U Tax - M&BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Village of Dry Prong, Louisiana ("Village"), under the provisions of Louisiana Constitution of 1974, Article VI, Section 29, and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to levy and collect a one-percent tax ("Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Village, all as defined by law, for a period of ten (10) years beginning January 1, 2020 (estimated $53,000.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax annually), with the avails and proceeds of the Tax (after paying reasonable, necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) received by the Village to be dedicated and used for the purpose of resurfacing streets within the Village except those under the jurisdiction of parish and state; and shall the Village be authorized to fund the proceeds of the Tax into bonds to pay for resurfacing said streets, to the extent and in the manner permitted by the laws of Louisiana, including Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950, Sub-Part F, Part III, Chapter 4, Title 39, as amended?
